name: Metanoia (itch) (Games Development - IADE-UE)
description:
3D CROSS Project developed by 2nd year students of the Games Development and Global Design courses (2020/2021).

Programmers:

  • Gabriel Vergari
  • Mariya Brovkina

Artists:

  • Camila Levin
  • Catarina Costa
  • Daniela Diniz
  • Diana Silva
  • Joana Bento

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Walk  
  • Mouse - Move camera
  • Left Mouse Button - Grab item / Select menu option
  • E - Interact / Breath mini-game
  • W, S - Navigate in menu
  • Esc - Pause game

Instructions:

  • Select the "Demo" menu option to play the game.

For more information about the university and the Games Development B.Sc., visit this link: https://www.iade.europeia.pt/en/courses/undergraduate/global-bachelor/games-deve...
